description: Enterprise techniques used by PittyTiger, ATT&CK group G0011 v1.2
name: PittyTiger (G0011)

techniques.comment: [PittyTiger](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0011) has obtained and used tools such as [Mimikatz](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0002) and [gsecdump](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0008).(Citation: Bizeul 2014)
[PittyTiger](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0011) attempts to obtain legitimate credentials during operations.(Citation: Bizeul 2014)
